parameters.name: AutoSnapshotPolicyId
parameters.description: The name of the automatic snapshot policy.

parameters.name: AutoSnapshotPolicyName
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Page start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic snapshot policy.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The key of tag N of the automatic snapshot policy. Valid values of N: 1 to 20. The tag key cannot be an empty string. It can be up to 128 characters in length and cannot start with acs: or aliyun. It cannot contain http:// or https://.
